title: Sean Payton has Coronavirus, Todd Gurley released, Best Remaining Free Agents (Football 3/20)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to discuss Thursday's free agency news and more. The guys first react to Sean Payton letting people know that he tested positive for coronavirus (9:30). The Pick Six Superfriends then analyze the Rams releasing Todd Gurley (16:15), what led to their fall from grace and the best landing spots for the former All-Pro running back. There have been so many signings over the past few days, but a few top-tier free agents remain available (38:00). Will, Ryan, John and Sean share the best landing spots for Jadeveon Clowney, Jameis Winston, Robby Anderson and Melvin Gordon. Lastly, Thursday's winners & losers (55:30) with a focus on Antonio Brown's NFL future, Darius Slay being traded to the Eagles and the Broncos releasing Joe Flacco.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

itunes:subtitle: While the signings have slowed, Thursday proved to be active in the NFL. The Pick Six Superfriends break down all the news you need to know from around the league.
